content: The AirTab 3 feels light yet sturdy in my hands. Highly recommend for anybody who doesn't like bulk.
I think as a console, the Altairia is mediocre at best. It can't play the games it does even have well at all.
To say that the AirTab 3 blows the competiton out of the water is an understatement. It's revolutionary in its field.
My AirTab 3 can keep the kiddos entertained, even myself with them sometimes too!
When I tried to boot my Altairia Console up for the first time, I couldn't figure it out without looking it up online. Very dissatisfied.
The Altairia Console is the perfect storm of everything that's wrong with the gaming industry. Watch my video about it, up on my channel now!
I wish the Altairia Console had more games. Playing on it is a blast, but 99% of the time, there's nothing to do.
I bought the Altairia Console for my daughter, but I can't seem to figure out how to get it to work.
I like playing on the Altairia Console for the way it feels in my hands, but in terms of game selection, it's pretty lackluster.
I really enjoy my AirTab 3. I can use it to work, play, and create, all on the same device. It doesn't lag or stutter at all, even when handling high-impact games.
I've been so much more productive since I got my AirTab 3. There are so many apps that help me organize my jumble of files from work.
Using my AirTab 3 is easier than any other new-fangled technology my grandkids try to get me to use. Even an old fart like me can figure it out!
The AirTab 3 makes doing my schoolwork a breeze. I can even play a couple rounds of Sudoku while taking my notes, I love the multitasking.
